# sortTrackReferences

Default sort for `TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder`<!-- -->, it'll order participants by: 1. local camera track (publication.isLocal) 2. remote screen_share track 3. local screen_share track 4. remote dominant speaker camera track (sorted by speaker with the loudest audio level) 5. other remote speakers that are recently active 6. remote unmuted camera tracks 7. remote tracks sorted by joinedAt

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function sortTrackReferences(
  tracks: TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[],
): TrackReferenceOrPlaceholder[];
```
